name: PRJECT: Dragon
description:
Description:

You are  finally old enough to become a Holy Knight but when you get to the castle to become one you are ordered to kill a dragon so you can become a Holy Knight. So you set out on your adventure...

Credits:

Engine: RPG Maker VX Ace

Music: Fyresale, Hyde, Kevvviiinnn

Assets: Andinator

Map Creator: ScientistDev, Little Nugget

Art: I am Plant, 

Developer: ScientistDev

WARNING: Game is in beta so there might be some bugs, if you find any major bugs email me: scientistdevwork@gmail.com or comment what you found and I will fix it, thanks.

Length: The game will take 30 to 40 mins, depends on how fast you go and how much you explore.
